description: This is an HTML source file that defines the structure, style, and client-side interactivity for a web-based database viewer application, including elements for database selection, table display, and data visualization.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and updates the sidebar UI.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show/hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table and displays it in a formatted table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for a data table given an array of data objects.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a table cell, handling different data types, including objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or truncate.
